name: PSiKYO Collection Vol. 3
overview: PSiKYO Collection Vol. 3 includes four titles: Strikers 1945 III, GUNBARICH, Zero Gunner 2, and Sengoku Cannon. Experience 4 everlasting PSiKYO shooters! STRIKERS 1945 III Enter the age of modern warfare for the first time on home consoles! Sengoku Cannon The grand finale of PSiKYO's legendary Sengoku trilogy! GUNBARICH Fantasy shoot 'em up and puzzle mechanics are merged together in this energetic game! ZERO GUNNER 2 Witness the revolutionary 360-degree aiming system in this full 3D shooter!
